body: *Start game with all conyards/robes available in ANY mod, sorry another time

Rewording the thing incase some gets confused: Allow players to share the starting slot, with one player spawning directly there, and others spawning in a radius of X cells (to allow their MCV deployed in their spawning cell).

I'm not certain but AFAIK RA2 Unholy Alliance mode worked this way, with spawning two MCVs for the player. (Notsure though, I always played UA in YR.)

Probably not feasible though due to maps weren't planned with such amount of buildspace.

Yes! Unholy Alliance!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QjrwlepZweE :)
but it would be more convenient if it is available to each player individually, but not in play mode.
It may be in the form of a check mark next to the selection of fractions?

"Probably not feasible though due to maps weren't planned with such amount of buildspace."
I think the players now can create maps that do not have enough space for the construction of even a single player.
I think this should not be a problem, as players choose their maps and the starting positions for the game

For a thirdparty mod it's beyond easy to have a "Starting Units" option that includes all sides' MCVs.
For the official mods, though, 1) I don't see it happening and 2) for some of them it's not possible, as the building prerequisites include the player's faction, not the present ConYards.
Can also be done with Lua for a custom map.

As for N players spawning at the same place - I don't see anything beneficial in that, and also the maps need to be specifically designed with that in mind (which they are obviously not). It might be a fun feature for a thirdparty mod to implement, but I really don't see the point (it can be done per map by placing the player spawns really close together).

"for some of them it's not possible, as the building prerequisites include the player's faction, not the present ConYards"
May be more specific? in this case, what happens when a player plays for the Allies, captures the Soviet ConYard with the help of an engineer?
By the way, in the RA2 Unholy Alliance modе,additional SCV not give the player the possibility of using units of concreaт race, such as the Korean planes or Teslatanks , only based units and structures from Allied or Soviet side

"As for N players spawning at the same place - I don't see anything beneficial in that, and also the maps need to be specifically designed with that in mind (which they are obviously not)." 
I do not think that we need some reworking of CI, it's just an additional opportunity for greater freedom of choice.
In fact StarCraft2 maps uses the same in this situation.
In any case, the choice is left to the players, if map with few resources around startins position, they will choose a different map, and perhaps even on the contrary, the players want to play on a map where there are few resources from one spawning

It may add _Unholy Alliance_ funktionality by adding checkbox or Drop-down list of gamemodes (free for all, team alianse, unholy Alliance... etc).
And if Unholly Alliance is checked, you may shoose standard maps and game automaticaly turn off "starting units" Drop-down list and use:

```
MPStartUnits@UnhollyAllianceAllies:
        Class: light
        ClassName: UnhollyAlliance
        Factions: allies, america, germany, england, france, korea
        BaseActor: amcv
        SupportActors: smcv
```
